meanings.definition: The area of the body where the abdomen meets the thigh.
meanings.sent1: He felt a sharp pain in his groin after running for a long time.
meanings.sent2: She gently massaged her groin to ease the discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about slipping on a banana peel and hurting his groin.
meanings.sent4: The meeting point of the two rivers resembled a natural groin in the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The athlete applied ice to his groin to reduce swelling after the game.

meanings.definition: A curved edge formed by two intersecting vaults.
meanings.sent1: The architect included a decorative groin in the design of the cathedral.
meanings.sent2: Light streamed in through the intricate groins of the cathedral's ceiling.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a whimsical scene with colorful groins in the background.
meanings.sent4: The intersection of the tree branches created a natural groin in the forest canopy.
meanings.sent5: The ancient building featured ornate groins that added to its grandeur.
